Bible Viewer

A simple Bible viewer where you can choose a translation, select a passage, and view the full chapter, with room later to highlight a specific verse. (TBD)

Select a Passage

Choose a translation and passage below. For now this is a placeholder layout—later, the controls can drive the viewer logic and highlight a specific verse within the chapter. (TBD)

Quick Reference Search

You can also type a reference (for example, “John 3:16” or “Romans 8”) to jump directly; the viewer will still show the full chapter and can later highlight the specific verse. (TBD)

External Study Tools

Alongside this simple viewer, you can also use external tools for deeper study:

  • Blue Letter Bible – verse-by-verse tools, lexicons, and cross-references.
  • Bible Gateway – multiple translations, audio, and reading plans.

Passage

This area will display the selected chapter from the chosen translation. A future highlight feature can visually mark the requested verse (for example, by bolding or background highlight). (TBD)
